DOC.brief_summary: To determine effect glycemic control lipid parameter 2.5 5 mg. dos BMS-298585 drug naive subject Type 2 diabetes adjunct diet exercise .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Evaluate BMS-298585 Monotherapy Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Who Have Inadequate Glycemic Control
DOC.criteria: Subjects Type 2 diabetes Drug Naive HbA1c > = 7.0 % < = 10.0 % Body Mass Index < = 41 kg/m2 Serum TG < = 600 mg/dL Symptomatic Type 2 diabetes History bladder cancer History Myocardial Infarction ( MI ) , coronary angioplasty bypass graft , valvular disease repair , unstable angina pectoris , Transient Ischemic Attach ( TIA ) , Cerebrovascular Accident ( CVA ) within 6 month , congestive heart failure ( NYHA Class II IV ) , uncontrolled hypertension , history renal disease , peripheral vascular disease ( PVD ) , pulmonary disease , gastrointestinal disease , active liver disease endocrine disease .
